name: Haute
description: HAUTE STYLE# P1018 The best thing about a solid maxi is wearing as much or as little jewelry as desired. Wear it your way. Our Ponte-di-roma maxi will make numerous appearances on your worst "I don't know what to wear days." Available in Black, Ivory Model is wearing an XS PRODUCT DETAILS • 69% Nylon 26% Rayon 5% Spandex • Cold water wash, low tumble dry • Pull over

name: Hayven
description: HAYVEN STYLE# P1015 Need a versatile dress? Get this dress that will take you from day to night, throw on a pair of wedged sneakers for your day time look or a pair of your fave sky high heels to get your party on at night. It's so comfy and has a great amount of stretch, it'll hug your body effortlessly. It features a houndstooth leatherette appliqué that adds a dash of "bad ass" and "class" all in one great look! Available in Whipped Ivory Cardinal Red Black Ink PRODUCT DETAILS • 80% Nylon 20% Spandex • Cold water wash, Low tumble dry • Pull-over
